Hit Points: 206 Initiative: 3 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Battleaxe; Handaxe; Light Hammer; Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons; Warhammer
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Club (+10 1d4+4); Greatsword (+10 2d6+4); Sling (+9 1d4+3 R30/120); Unarmed (+10 1+4)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +3
Dwarven Combat Training: Weapon Proficiency (Battleaxe; Handaxe; Light Hammer; Warhammer)
Dwarven Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Damage Adjustment: +4
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Unarmored Defense (Barbarian): +3 Armor Class in no armor
Battlerager Armor: When wearing spiked armor during rage, can use a bonus action for a spike attack that inflicts 1d4+4 HP piercing, and a successful grapple inflicts 3 HP piercing
Battlerager Charge: Can use a bonus action to Dash during rage
Brutal Critical: Melee critical hits inflict 3 additional dice of damage
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Feral Instinct: Has advantage on initiative/Can rage and then act when surprised
Persistent Rage: Can continue raging when unengaged with any foe
Rage: +4 damage with Strength melee weapons during rage
Reckless Abandon: Using Reckless Attack during rage gives 3 temporary hit points
Reckless Attack: During rage, can suffer foe advantage on attacks to gain advantage on Strength melee attacks for 1 rd
Sentinel: Successful opportunity attacks halt the target/Can take an opportunity attack when a foe uses Disengage/Can use a reaction to attack when an adjacent foe attacks another
Spiked Retribution: When wearing spiked armor during rage, a successful melee attacker suffers 3 HP piercing
Totemic Attunement (Elk): During rage, can use a bonus action to pass through the space of a Large or smaller creature and inflict 1d12+4 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save DC 18 Strength negates)
Totemic Attunement (Tiger): During rage, can use a bonus action to make a melee attack after a 20' charge
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 0; Constitution: 9; Dexterity: 3; Intelligence: -2; Strength: 10; Wisdom: 0
Save Notes:
Danger Sense: Has advantage on Dexterity vs. visible dangers
Dwarven Resilience: Has advantage vs. poison and resistance to poison damage
Rage: Has advantage on Strength saves and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage during rage
Relentless Rage: Can make a DC 10 Constitution save to retain 1 hit point when brought to 0 hit points; each use adds 5 to the DC until a short rest
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 2; D1: 1 Attack: Barbarian: 6; D: 6 Spell DC: Barbarian: 14; D: 14
Spells:
Beast Sense (Barbarian2 [Spirit Seeker] Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Commune With Nature (Barbarian5 [Spirit Walker] Divi): Reveals 3 facts about nature within 3 miles, or within 300' when underground [R]
Healing Word (D1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+0 hit points [+Level restores +1d4 hit points]
Produce Flame (D0 Conj): Lights a 10' radius for 10 min; can be used for a ranged spell attack that inflicts 4d8 HP and ends the spell
Speak With Animals (Barbarian1 [Spirit Seeker] Divi): Self can talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Thorn Whip (D0 Tran): R30' Ranged spell inflicts 4d6 HP and pulls a Large or smaller target 10'
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 druid cantrips and can cast a chosen D1 spell once per long rest
Rage: Cannot cast or concentrate on spells during rage
Spirit Seeker: Can cast ritual Beast Sense and Speak With Animals
Spirit Walker: Can cast ritual Commune With Nature
